rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0010
rows.name: An Ares[ST:wide ]— you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0020
rows.name: I couldn't confirm the pilot, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0025
rows.name: That is undoubtedly an Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0030
rows.name: And the original model, at that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0040
rows.name: Lin, what is your take?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0050
rows.name: Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0060
rows.name:
That mobility[ST:wide ]— That maneuverability is
hard to think of as anything other than an Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0070
rows.name: So, the pilot is also likely[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0080
rows.name: Which means...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0090
rows.name: Does that mean he was alive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_JNK0010
rows.name: Question

rows.label: xs31080100_SEL0010
rows.name: Tilt your head and ask who they are talking about.

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0100
rows.name: Alois Bernholt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0110
rows.name:
The pilot of the Ares,
and the hero who saved us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_JNK0020
rows.name: Envy

rows.label: xs31080100_SEL0020
rows.name: Passionately convey that he was incredibly skilled.

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0120
rows.name: Alois Bernholt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0130
rows.name: If the pilot is him, then it makes sense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0140
rows.name: It's frustrating, but even I can't beat him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0150
rows.name: Actually, I have a report too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0160
rows.name: [ST:wide ]—It's not the good kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0170
rows.name: Let's hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0180
rows.name: About the Vita you guys saw[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0190
rows.name: Unfortunately, it's the real thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0200
rows.name: Wasn't it supposed to be in the sealed Central Life[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0210
rows.name: When we checked...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0220
rows.name:
The machine that should have been inside
had disappeared without a trace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0230
rows.name: Did it disappear getting caught in the phenomenon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0240
rows.name: Or perhaps[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0250
rows.name: An Ares, the Vita, and the disappearance phenomenon[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0260
rows.name: I'm already at my limit here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0270
rows.name: There's also the Ghosts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0280
rows.name: Ghosts[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0290
rows.name: An existence I don't know about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0300
rows.name:
If possible,
I'd like you to tell us more details[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0310
rows.name: Sorry, but we don't know much either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0320
rows.name:
Just that they were an alien civilization
hostile to the Growth[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0330
rows.name: They were certainly hostile, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0340
rows.name:
It felt more like the Ghosts were
unilaterally beating down the Growth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0350
rows.name: That Growth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0360
rows.name: That means they're pretty dangerous guys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0370
rows.name: In the end,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0380
rows.name:
We, who got caught up in the invasion war
between the Ghosts and the Growth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0390
rows.name: Are the biggest victims, aren't we.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0400
rows.name: It's not that simple a story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0410
rows.name: The appearance of the Ghosts is an omen of collapse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0420
rows.name:
When we actually witnessed the collision
between the Ghosts and the Growth[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0430
rows.name: What happened back then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0440
rows.name: Back then[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0450
rows.name: Earth was annihilated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0460
rows.name: And...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0470
rows.name: That was not the first time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0480
rows.name: In the past, the planet where I was born also[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0490
rows.name: Was lost in the same way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0500
rows.name: Elma-san's[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0510
rows.name: Planet of birth[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0520
rows.name: Mira, which has started disappearing[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0525
rows.name: The Ghosts that appeared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0530
rows.name: And the Ares[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0540
rows.name: There is a causal link in all these events.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0550
rows.name: Elma[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0560
rows.name: It's okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0570
rows.name: Right now, here, I want everyone to listen[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0580
rows.name: To the story of me, who lost my homeland twice[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0590
rows.name: Where I was born...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0600
rows.name:
Although it went through a different evolution
across a long and distant separation of space-time[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0610
rows.name:
It was a star where descendants of Samaar lived,
same as you Earthlings[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0620
rows.name:
It was a friendly and peaceful planet
that did not war with other planets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0630
rows.name: The Growth's raid[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0640
rows.name: That began without any warning[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0650
rows.name:
Their goal was
to eradicate the descendants of Samaar[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0660
rows.name: And one more thing[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0670
rows.name: Was the seizure of the Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0680
rows.name: Eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0690
rows.name: The Ares?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0700
rows.name: How is the Ares related?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0710
rows.name: I don't know the details either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0720
rows.name: However[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0730
rows.name:
The Ares was not created by us.
The source of its technology lies...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0740
rows.name: In the era of the progenitor, Samaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0750
rows.name:
We merely reproduced it
based on super-ancient records and relics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0760
rows.name: That means[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0770
rows.name: Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0780
rows.name: The Growth are synthetic lifeforms created by Samaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0790
rows.name: The Ares is also something created by Samaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0800
rows.name: It wouldn't be strange if there was a causal relationship between these two.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0810
rows.name:
That's why the Vita went chasing
after the Ares, isn't it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0820
rows.name: But, we still don't understand the reason why the Ghosts appeared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0830
rows.name: There is still more to the story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0840
rows.name: The battle with the Growth continued for a long time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0850
rows.name: Amidst the repeated offense and defense...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0860
rows.name: Suddenly, a disappearance phenomenon occurred on the home planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0870
rows.name: And a third force appeared, showing hostility to both sides.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0880
rows.name: That was[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0890
rows.name: The Ghosts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0900
rows.name:
The Ghosts, appearing suddenly, began to attack us
and the Growth without will or reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0910
rows.name: The battle fell into chaos[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0920
rows.name: My home planet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0930
rows.name: Was devastated by the combat...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0940
rows.name: And the land was swallowed by the disappearance phenomenon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0950
rows.name: The fate of my home planet was sealed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0960
rows.name: Therefore...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0970
rows.name: They sent me, along with the Ares, to Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0980
rows.name:
If the Growth survived, the next thing they would target
was the planet where the same descendants of Samaar lived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0990
rows.name: Because there was no other place but Earth[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1000
rows.name: I conveyed the Ares' technology to Earthlings...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1010
rows.name: And urged scientific progress that could counter the Growth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1020
rows.name: But in the end, I couldn't save Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1030
rows.name: And I lost the Ares and the hero[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_JNK0030
rows.name: Optimism

rows.label: xs31080100_SEL0030
rows.name: Say that you are living here now.

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1040
rows.name: That's true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1050
rows.name: The situation is similar, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1060
rows.name: It is thanks to you that we are alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1070
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1080
rows.name: We are here because Colonel Elma was here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1090
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_JNK0040
rows.name: Pessimism

rows.label: xs31080100_SEL0040
rows.name: Look down and worry about the future.

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1100
rows.name: Indeed. Elma's home planet, Earth, Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1110
rows.name: The situations are strikingly similar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1120
rows.name: But, there are differences too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1140
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1150
rows.name:
We escaped using the technology Elma brought
and are living here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1160
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1170
rows.name:
If Elma weren't here, by now we would have
shared our fate with the Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1180
rows.name: That's how it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1190
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1200
rows.name: That is the whole story regarding me and the Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1210
rows.name:
Through the Growth,
there is a causality between the Ares and the Ghosts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1220
rows.name: And when the Ghosts appear[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1230
rows.name: The planet disappears[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1240
rows.name:
Does that mean the source of this disappearance phenomenon
is the Ares?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1250
rows.name:
Just like Elma-san's home planet and Earth,
this Mira too[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1260
rows.name: Yes, that's what it comes down to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1270
rows.name: What we have to do is simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1280
rows.name: In other words...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1290
rows.name: We just have to find that Ares first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1300
rows.name: But[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1310
rows.name: Why doesn't the Ares contact us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1320
rows.name: There shouldn't be any need to hide their identity, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1330
rows.name: Commander Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1340
rows.name: What is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1350
rows.name: Confirmed response of Dolls in combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1360
rows.name: Count is two machines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1370
rows.name: Got caught in the Frontier Net already, huh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1380
rows.name: The energy response is abnormal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1390
rows.name: Average Dolls can't do this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1400
rows.name: Does that mean[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1410
rows.name:
The first prediction is that it's
the Ares and the Vita.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1420
rows.name: Saves us the trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1430
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1440
rows.name: Let's head out immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1450
rows.name: The opponent might be the Vita.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1460
rows.name: Handle this with everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1470
rows.name: Roger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1480
rows.name: No need to be too cautious, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1490
rows.name: Watch out, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1500
rows.name: Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1510
rows.name: But, what we can do now is[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1520
rows.name:
To draw in the path of possibility
with our own hands[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]
